The '''Pocket Edition Demo''' or '''Pocket Edition Lite''' was a demo version of {{PE}} that was discontined after [[v0.2.1 alpha2]]. One of the ''Pocket Edition Demo''/''Lite''{{'}}s limited features was that your worlds would not be saved, and out of the total 36 different blocks, only 18 were available.
